module.p: The particle na has a number of uses in Gaelic.

lix.gd: Rugadh am feallsanach Soren Kierkegaard ann sa’ bhliadhna 1813, an Copenhagen far na bhàsaich e nuair a bha e dà fhichead, ’s a dhà.
lix.tr: The philosopher Soren Kierkegaard was born in 1813, in Copenhagen where he died when he was 42.
